org.mini2Dx.core.quadtree

Class Quad<T extends Positionable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Rectangle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.quadtree.Quad<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Shape2D, java.io.Serializable, Parallelogram, Positionable, PositionChangeListener<T>, Shape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegionQuad

    public class Quad<T extends Positionable>
extends Rectangle
implements PositionChangeListener<T>
    Implements a point quad
    See Also:
    Wikipedia: Point Quad Tree, Serialized Form
